channel.title: bash on Open Monster Vision
channel.description: Recent content in bash on Open Monster Vision

item.title: How Not to Build a Cli With Node
item.description: The Who I’m just a dude, that writes shit down. Occasionally I write something useful for sys admins, but mostly my github is a garbage place where ideas go to die. I am @bsdpunk, and I am a terrible person. And mostly I write shells that don’t currently work, but maybe did at one time, or maybe can if you give me a minute. The What This guy wrote a post I don’t agree with and I’m going to complain about it.

item.title: Turning the D and D Monster Manual into JSON
item.description: The What I found a PDF copy of the monster manual (Of course I also own a copy, but I needed digital for this). I was able to grep out all the tables for monster stats…however, I couldn’t find a way to programatically get their names so I assigned them ID numbers. Git Repo GNU vs BSD Tools Though generally I script on my mac, I use the gnu tools vs the bsd tools.

item.title: How to Make Money Using Grep Sed and Awk
item.description: The Who I’m your friendly neighborhood unix man. And I have a problem. I love regex. Now I have two problems. The Why Recently I have become destitute so I have taken to using the skills I have to provide for my poor sick family. It’s mostly disabled cats. And when all you have is hammer, everything gets nailed. So I thought, you know what people probably don’t automate enough of…Data Entry.
